definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)
to be unable to move a single step

sentences.english: By the end of his shows, only a few iron beasts still move.
sentences.chinese: 每次表演结束，还能自己动弹的铁武士就寥寥可数了。

sentences.english: Realizing data exchange to reflect coupling between fluid and structures is essential to solving static aeroelasticity problems.
sentences.chinese: 研究静气动弹性问题一大关键是要解决流固数据耦合。

sentences.english: You've been working hard all day and you just can't push it anymore.
sentences.chinese: 你已经用功了一整天，你累得完全不想再动弹了。

sentences.english: The animals are kept in tiny cages and can hardly move at all.
sentences.chinese: 动物们被关进小笼子里，几乎都不能动弹。

sentences.english: Vortex-induced vibration is one of recurring aeroelastic dynamic responses of flexible structures.
sentences.chinese: 涡激振动是柔性结构易发生的气动弹性现象。

sentences.english: This fear confined me to a narrow comfort zone.
sentences.chinese: 恐惧心理把我局限在狭窄的安乐窝里动弹不得。

sentences.english: I got stuck in the elevator for twenty minutes.
sentences.chinese: 我因电梯故障二十分钟而动弹不得。

sentences.english: They grab the immobilized Jack and drag him inside.
sentences.chinese: 他们抓住了不能动弹的杰克，把他拖进了门里。

sentences.english: I parried; but my hands were loath and cold.
sentences.chinese: 我想躲闪，但我的双手因寒冷已无法动弹。

sentences.english: The moxa benefit Zheng Zheng looking at her, tin not shake.
sentences.chinese: 艾利怔怔的看着她，无法动弹。

sentences.english: A wrestling hold in which the opponent's arm is held so that it cannot be moved.
sentences.chinese: 摔跤擒拿法，抓紧对手的手臂令其动弹不得。

sentences.english: We are stuck in the city traffic.
sentences.chinese: 我们在市区里动弹不得。

sentences.english: The bus was so crowded that nobody could move.
About an hour later, I tried to get up from a chair and couldn't move.
sentences.chinese: 一小时后，我试着从椅子上站起来却发现已不能动弹。

sentences.english: This time he fell face downward on the pavement, and moved no more.
sentences.chinese: 这一次，他脸朝地倒下去，不再动弹了。

sentences.english: My car was stuck in the mud.
sentences.chinese: 我的汽车陷在泥里不能动弹。

definition: to be unable to move a single step
to fiddle with/to tamper with/to meddle with/to move randomly/to flail about
to evade/to dodge (out of the way)
to relinquish one's grip/to let go
